title: Bump SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux from 2.88.1 to 2.88.3
body:
Bumps [SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp) from 2.88.1 to 2.88.3.
Release notes

Sourced from SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux's releases.

Version 2.88.3

What's Changed

  • Add RTLD_DEEPBIND flag to dlopen mode by @​snnz in mono/SkiaSharp#2247
  • Fix the use of vcpkg by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2257
  • Use new .NET things by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2264
  • A skip is basically a read to a null buffer by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2265
  • feat: Generate for Emscripten 3.1.12 and SIMD features by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2259
  • Add build infrastructure for .NET 7 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2255
  • Update to ubuntu-20.04 by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2256
  • Add .NET 7 Support for Blazor views by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2254
  • Intercept and capture GL for .NET by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2268
  • fix(wasm): Adjust for invalid globbing for 3.1.12 archive lookup by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2269

New Contributors

  • @​snnz made their first contribution in mono/SkiaSharp#2247

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/compare/v2.88.2...v2.88.3

Version 2.88.2

What's Changed

  • [Tizen] Change tizen graphics backend engine by @​myroot in mono/SkiaSharp#2225
  • fix: Remove unused native library block from SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.UI/WinUI by @​jeromelaban in mono/SkiaSharp#2231
  • Convert SKRect to CGRect correctly by @​mattleibow in mono/SkiaSharp#2243

New Contributors

  • @​myroot made their first contribution in mono/SkiaSharp#2225

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/compare/v2.88.1...v2.88.2

Commits
  • 655cff0 fix(wasm): Adjust for invalid globbing for 3.1.12 archive lookup (#2269)
  • 5816e44 Intercept and capture GL for .NET (#2268)
  • ddfa128 Add .NET 7 Support for Blazor views (#2254)
  • cb9e814 Update to ubuntu-20.04 (#2256)
  • 20a1180 Add build infrastructure for .NET 7 (#2255)
  • 1385a7f feat: Generate for Emscripten 3.1.12 and SIMD features (#2259)
  • 3610666 A skip is basically a read to a null buffer (#2265)
  • 023ee8e Use new .NET things (#2264)
  • 9ce587d Fix the use of vcpkg (#2257)
  • 482e6ee Add RTLD_DEEPBIND flag to dlopen mode (#2247)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
